title: Bayer cuts Monsanto synergy target by $300 mln
text:
Bayer cuts Monsanto synergy target by $300 mln 5:49pm BST - 01:59
Pharmaceutical and life science multi-national Bayer said on Friday that positive synergy effects from the planned takeover of U.S. seeds maker Monsanto would be about $300 million below its previous target because it will sell more businesses than initially expected to get antitrust approval. Kate King reports. ▲ Hide Transcript ▶ View Transcript
